Key Match Events: USA stunned Bangladesh by five wickets
Harmeet Singh and Corey Anderson starred in the USA's historic win
Towhid Hridoy led Bangladesh with a 47-ball 58
Muztafizur Rahman turned hero for Bangladesh with twin strikes but conceded two sixes off his last two balls in the 18th over
Harmeet Singh clobbered three sixes and two fours and forged a 60-run unbroken partnership with Corey Anderson
Post-Match Reflections: Harmeet Singh was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first ever international fixture between the two nations
Others: The match was played at the Prairie View Cricket Complex in Houston, Texas
